page.title: 07BIOGRAPHY, NURSE
page.content: KATE WORKS AT ASHRIDGE NURSING HOME SHE HAS BEEN A NURSE THERE FOR JUST OVER 1 YEAR.SHE WAS BORN IN ABERDEEN, IN SCOTLAND BUT MOVED TO ISRAEL.LATER SHE FOUND SHE HAD A SISTER IN BEXHILL. SO SHE MOVED HERE.SHE HAS A CAR AND SO SHE DOESNT OFTEN USE PUBLIC TRANSPORT WHICH SHE FINDS APPALING. HER HOBBIES INCLUDE KNITTING AND FLYING SMALL AIRCRAFT,WHICH SHE HAS PILOTED TO A HIEGHT OF 20,000 FEET.SHE ALSO ENJOYS BALLROOM DANCING. SHE SHOPS IN HASTINGS RATHER THAN BEXHILL,AS SHE FINDS THEY HAVE WHAT SHE NEEDS.KATE HAS A LOT OF VISITORS, MOSTLY NEIGHBOURS;SHE LIKES TV,AND IN GOOD WEATHER LIKES TO SUNBATHE ON THE BEACH.SHE DOES NOT LIKE ANY FORM OF CRUELTY TO ANIMALS,THOUGH SHE HATES SHARKS AND SPIDERS:SHE HAS A PUPPY CALLED SAM,AND LIKES LIONS.
